title: Income ratios and eligibility
body: Income thresholds, qualifying ratios and examples for conventional and FHA. Includes front-end and back-end DTI discussion.

title: Closing disclosures 101
body: Overview of the Closing Disclosure (CD), timing requirements, and common tolerance cures with examples.

title: Appraisal waivers
body: When appraisal waivers apply, risk considerations, and lender overlays that may still require a full appraisal.
